name: Mega Apocalypse
description:
Mega Apocalypse is a shoot 'em up video game for the Commodore 64, BBC Micro, Amstrad CPC, and ZX Spectrum. It is the sequel to Crazy Comets. Both games are clones of Gottlieb's 1983 arcade game Mad Planets. Crazy Comets even uses the same logo design on the title screen as Mad Planets, while that for Mega Apocalypse is entirely different.

The music is by Rob Hubbard.
